value: The village in the high mountains

The village is situated on the Italian side of the Passo Della Spluga (
and is the last town on the italian part of the Via Spluga, yet it is often cut off from both countries in winter.
is an option, but only in summer as the pass is closed in winter. From here a road is the only way to reach Montespluga.
This is a very small place , so on foot is the best way, there are no bus services in the village.

There are genuinely no major attractions in Montespluga, it is very much a activity place. The only real thing to see is the spectacular high mountain scenery as this is the border between the Rhaetian and Lepontine Alps.
